mapper.select: select HW_ROLE.MODEL_ID as tokenOfModel,HW_ROLE.NAME as name,HW_ROLE.NT as nt,HW_ROLE.ID as token,HW_ROLE.TYPE as type from HW_ROLE

select HW_ROLE.NAME as name,HW_ROLE.NT as nt,HW_ROLE.ID as token,HW_ROLE.TYPE as type,HW_MODEL0.ID as tokenOfModel,HW_MODEL0.NAME as modelDesp from HW_ROLE left join HW_MODEL HW_MODEL0 on ( HW_MODEL0.ID = HW_ROLE.MODEL_ID)

select HW_ROLE.NAME as name,HW_ROLE.NT as nt,HW_ROLE.ID as token,HW_ROLE.TYPE as type,HW_MODEL0.ID as tokenOfModel,HW_MODEL0.NAME as modelDesp from HW_ROLE left join HW_MODEL HW_MODEL0 on ( HW_MODEL0.ID = HW_ROLE.MODEL_ID)
select HW_ROLE.MODEL_ID as tokenOfModel,HW_ROLE.NAME as name,HW_ROLE.NT as nt,HW_ROLE.ID as token,HW_ROLE.TYPE as type from HW_ROLE WHERE HW_ROLE.ID = #{token}

select HW_ROLE.NAME as name,HW_ROLE.NT as nt,HW_ROLE.ID as token,HW_ROLE.TYPE as type,HW_MODEL0.ID as tokenOfModel,HW_MODEL0.NAME as modelDesp from HW_ROLE left join HW_MODEL HW_MODEL0 on ( HW_MODEL0.ID = HW_ROLE.MODEL_ID) WHERE HW_ROLE.ID = #{token}
